name: Salaryman: Symphony of the Nine to Five
name_original: Salaryman: Symphony of the Nine to Five
description:
Made in 32 hours during the PTBO Game Jam, this Castlevania rip-off homage consists of pixelated art styles, multiple enemy types, and dynamic spawning mechanics. Random enemy spawns make every play-through a unique experience! In this technical demo see how many corporate drones you can defeat before succumbing to ennui and becoming ONE OF THEM D:

X to attack, Space to jump, move with arrow keys or WASD.
